meanings.definition: The act of fitting or adapting something to a particular purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: The fitment of the new shelves in the closet was done perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The fitment of the puzzle pieces was challenging but satisfying.
meanings.sent3: The fitment of the oversized hat on the tiny dog was quite a sight.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was the perfect fitment for the team's innovative project.
meanings.sent5: The fitment of the key in the lock clicked smoothly into place.

meanings.definition: An item or component that is fitted or adapted to something else.
meanings.sent1: The car's fitment of new tires improved its performance.
meanings.sent2: The fitment of the missing piece completed the jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent3: The fitment of the superhero cape on the cat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the missing fitment in the team's strategy.
meanings.sent5: The fitment of the crown on her head made her feel like a queen.
